transcript.text: Hey ! Look what i just receive, friends ! a little gift from "Enchroma" !
If you have an excellent memory you might remember of "Enchroma" huh ?
This little test of colour blindness I made
The cool thing with this video
Is that a lot of people went to make this test
on their website.
So Ancroma spotted the move about my video, they found my video and decided to
Send me anti-daltonism glasses
To help my daltonism
Remember, I'm Deuteranomal, because I hardly see green
Those who hardly see the red are Protanomal
There's also the people who hardly see the blue, they are Tritanomal
Yes it's hard
There's different glasses in term of your daltonism type

There are also blindcolor who just see  
one color

And with these glasses, blindcolor could have a vision like normal people,
But your vision isn't as perfect as the vision of other is
But me, my daltonism isn't so intense and I wonder
If it will have a real impact on my vision

Because I... I didn't think that it was a real handicap
I didn't know that I was colour-blind, I thought I had a small failure but I didn't know that I was colour blindness
Yes, that's clearly naïve
Pam Pam Pam Paaaaam
I have them ! So these glasses are outdoor glasses
You have to use them outside
When it's sunny. It's the case, we are lucky
You have to know that it works for 4 people on 5 and not for 100% of the users
And also that the effect will not be instant
But the effect of the style will be instant !
It will take about 10 or 15 minutes and I hope that
I'm not one out of 5 people who doesn't feel the effects
it would annoy me, I'm gonna go outside
I bought some colorful fruits and vegetables
Like an apple ! Or a tomato ! Because it's an object that everybody know the color
And that the color is very flashy. So I think it will be a good test !
The last information before we go
Men have one chromosome X and women two
And it's this chromosome X who has the gene of daltonism
So there's one guy on 12 in this planet who is color blind
And one girl on 200
A girl has two chromosomes X so one of them has the gene of daltonism
The second is safe so she sees the colors like a normal person
But sometimes the two chromosomes X have the gene of daltonism, so the girl is blindcolor
France has 65 millions people
So there are 3 millions of blind color
And I'm convinced there are so many people who don't know their colorblindness
That was the statistic moment
